title: Riginac111
author: Riginac111
content: Everyone have a target and if you don't have a target you will not achieve your goals, and if you allow 2024 to come first before you began to think of what you achieve inside 2024 I think is a wrong plan of thinking and sometimes another thing will make us to deviate from what we are often to achieve. Myself I think that our brothers that registered newly this will make them to think of what to do and what not to do as their plan to achieve betterment in the forum. Let me start by reviewing my small plans in 2024 but I will not review all at least some of them if it will reach up to two, because our people said that we should think for the future and also documents our plans should in case if we are not opportune to make use of our plans and any other person who view our plans can work on it for its benefits. Accumulating of bitcoin: this is my first plan in 2024, because I seen that many of us praise bitcoin but we don't have more of bitcoin, why some people from other locals boards have thousands of bitcoin.What strategies can be use to accumulate a bitcoin: this is another thing we should think of in bitcoin accumulations, some of us do not buy bitcoin when the price is low but they buy bitcoin when the price is increasing, the best time to accumulate your bitcoin is when is in DIP and when it rise you get high numbers of bitcoin.At least this is one of the plan I have next year no matter bullrun or bearish manifest and I will like us to outline our plans we have in bitcoin in next year

Quote from: Riginac111 on November 06, 2023, 07:54:20 AMMyself I think that our brothers that registered newly this will make them think of what to do and what not to do as their plan to achieve betterment in the forum. For the new guys, they have to learn to invest in Bitcoin. That is the best way to make something huge from the system. Since you are not already earning Bitcoin, put N10k per week while you build your account... this will make you not to miss the next bull run. Bitcoin price may shift above $100k from 2024 going forward. You won't like yourself if that happens and you don't own some Bitcoin. This is my suggestion, and it should not be taken as investment advice... still do your own due diligence.

comments.body: Without proper plan all our labours are in vain. In everything planning is the Paramount thing to do first before any other movement or act. In this industry the beginners want to acquire 1 bitcoin and those who have acquired 1 bitcoin want to acquire more bitcoins. So the aims are different but the goals might be the same because everyone is planning to store their bitcoins for a long term. This is still the best time to start.As for me, my target is to achieve 1btc before the end of 2024. And if that can be achieved then I will sell another goal with different aims again.
